## Temporary Foreign Worker Program’s Telephone Interpretation Services

### Title
Temporary Foreign Worker Program’s Telephone Interpretation Services

### Reference
CB-376-66441453
Amendment 006, Solicitation Number: 100024511

### Publication Date
October 16, 2023

### Tender Closing Date
November 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Current Tender Status
Expired

### Overview

The Temporary Foreign Worker Program (TFWP) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires the services of a third-party expert (Contractor) to provide telephone interpretation services to support inspectors conducting employer compliance inspections and assist call centre agents with the intake of tips/allegations via the TFWP Tip line (1-866-602-9448).

### Objectives

* Ensure clients who do not speak one of Canada’s official languages have access to the same level of service as those that do.
* Provide interpretation services for English or French to multiple different languages and vice-versa.

### Interpreted Languages

At a minimum, the successful bidder will be capable of interpreting English or French to the following languages:

* English to: French, Spanish, Mandarin, Punjabi, Cantonese, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Polish, Korean, Russian, Arabic, Farsi, Tamil, Hindi, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, Greek, Tagalog, and Thai.
* French to: English, Spanish, Mandarin, Punjabi, Cantonese, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Polish, Korean, Russian, Arabic, Farsi, Tamil, Hindi, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, Greek, Tagalog, and Thai.

### Solicitation

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to bidders who meet the selection criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal.

### Selection Criteria

The selection criteria is based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, with the contract being awarded to the bidder who achieves the highest combined rating.

### Contracting Entity
Employment and Social Development Canada, 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0M3.

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Jie Bai
* Contact Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (819) 999-9999
